values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Its only after you've stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change grow and transform

values.title: Joss Whedon
values.desc: Very occasionally if you pay really close attention life doesnt suck

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: What you stay focused on will grow

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: The true measure of success is how many times you can bounce back from failure

values.title: TF Hodge
values.desc: To conquer frustration one must remain intensely focused on the outcome not the obstacles

values.title: Idowu Koyenikan
values.desc: Where your attention goes your time goes

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: Reality is a projection of your thoughts or the things you habitually think about

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: Our way of thinking creates good or bad outcomes

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: When your back is to the wall and you are facing fear head on the only way is forward and through it

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: Success will be within your reach only when you start reaching out for it

values.title: Dark Jar Tin Zoo
values.desc: I make love with a focus and intensity that most people reserve for sleep

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: No matter how small you start always dream big

values.title: Stephen Richards
values.desc: It sometimes takes a state of solitude to bring to mind the real power of companionship
